About Wallace


Landing-Page is a free Bootstrap 3 theme created by Start Bootstrap. It can be yours right now, simply download the template on the preview page. The theme is open source, and you can use it for any purpose, personal or commercial.

The Jekyll version is brought to you by Shane Weng

This theme features stock photos by Death to the Stock Photo.

Landing-Page includes full HTML, CSS, and custom JavaScript files along with LESS files for easy customization.


Open Source

Wallaceâ€™s code is free to use and modify (GPL 3.0), and it gives users access to some of the largest public online biodiversity databases.

Expandible

Wallace is a modular application, where each module is a methodological option in the analysis. Users can author and contribute their own modules.

Flexible

Wallace features multiple options for user uploads and downloads of results.

Interactive

The user experience features a pannable/zoomable map, sortable tables, and many different visualizations of results.

Instructive

Guidance text for both components and modules educates users about the theoretical and methodological aspects of the analysis.

Reproducible

The code for the user session can be downloaded as an R Markdown file that can be run like a script to reproduce the analysis. This code can also be downloaded as PDF, HTML, or Microsoft Word file.
